alert.note: Alert for Coastal Aransas; Coastal Refugio; Inland Refugio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 5:12AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Aransas and central Refugio Counties through 600 AM CDT... At 512 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Quintana, or 8 miles southeast of Refugio, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Quintana. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 614 and 616. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Aransas; Coastal Refugio; Inland Refugio
